name: HTML
details: Advanced understanding of semantics.
Taking care of accessible DOM structure.
Deep knowledge of HTML element attributes.

name: CSS
details: Good awareness of CSS styling dependencies.
Using preprocessors to compile into CSS.
Creating advanced and layered animations.

name: JavaScript
details: Good & fluent knowledge of ES6+ standards.
Efficiently working with Ajax techniques.
Splitting code into separate logical parts.

name: React
details: Building clean & modular components.
Knowledge of the React ecosystem.
Fluent usage of the various React Hooks.

name: Vue.js
details: Effective data processing and its presentation.
Working with multiple Vue instances.
Integrating Vue into existing systems.

name: PHP
details: Practical usage of the OOP principles.
Writing secure and non-invasive services.
Efficient communication with database.

name: Modern Tools
details: Using linters to keep code clean & consistent.
Working with many transpilers and compilers.
Fluent usage of package managers.

name: Git
details: Good understanding of popular Git concepts.
Correct workflow with commits and branches.
Experience with daily and collaborative usage.

name: Go
details: Creating efficient and clean backend services.
Building desktop apps with GUI.
